price: Tomam eles, além dEle, protetores? Então, Allah é O Único Protetor. E Ele dá a vida aos mortos. E Ele, sobre todas as cousas, é Onipotente.
arabic: أَمِ ٱتَّخَذُواْ مِن دُونِهِۦٓ أَوۡلِيَآءَۖ فَٱللَّهُ هُوَ ٱلۡوَلِيُّ وَهُوَ يُحۡيِ ٱلۡمَوۡتَىٰ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٞ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: ami ittakhadhū min dūnihi awliyāa fal-lahu huwa al-waliyu wahuwa yuḥ'yī al-mawtā wahuwa ʿalā kulli shayin qadīrun
